plot: The late Horace T. Blue's palacial estate "Blue Heaven" has been bequeathed to a carnival stripper, much to the chagrin of Horace's great-niece, who schemes to disgrace her and keep the mansion for herself.
title: Electric Blue 47
plot_es: The late Horace T. Blue's palacial estate "Blue Heaven" has been bequeathed to a carnival stripper, much to the chagrin of Horace's great-niece, who schemes to disgrace her and keep the mansion for herself.
plot_en: The late Horace T. Blue's palacial estate "Blue Heaven" has been bequeathed to a carnival stripper, much to the chagrin of Horace's great-niece, who schemes to disgrace her and keep the mansion for herself.
